about.description: Easily book an appointment with nearby healthcare professionals through digital solutions. Doctagné allows you to consult a medical professional from your phone or computer without moving.
about.quote: Because having good health is already a step towards happiness.
about.item1: Accessible, confidential, and useful healthcare for everyone.
about.item2: Every appointment made can have a social impact.
about.final: Together, let’s work for a healthier world.

hero.title: Your health within reach wherever you are
hero.description: Manage your health and that of your loved ones safely. Book appointments with doctors, pharmacies, and laboratories, consult online, and track your medical results all in one platform.

items.title: Medical Management
items.description: Simplify appointment management in one place. With our solution, medical follow-up becomes smooth, fast, and paperless.

items.title: Telemedicine
items.description: Remote consultations, safely and securely. Health doesn’t wait — receive medical support wherever you are, anytime.

items.title: Pharmacy
items.description: Easily find prescribed medicines and connect patients to the nearest pharmacy. Continuity of care from diagnosis to delivery.

items.title: Laboratory
items.description: Receive and share test results online without traveling. Save time, ensure better follow-up, and facilitate communication between doctor and patient.

footer.text: Take the first step toward better health –

cta.mainTitle: Start your health journey with us today!
cta.description: Our team is here to support you throughout your healthcare journey with personalized service, qualified professionals, and follow-up tailored to your needs.

items.question: How do I book an appointment on Doctagné?
items.answer: Simply create a free account, search for a healthcare professional (doctor, pharmacy, or laboratory), and choose an available time slot. You’ll receive confirmation by email and SMS.

items.question: Is the platform secure?
items.answer: Absolutely! Your medical data is encrypted and protected according to GDPR standards. Only you and the healthcare professionals you consult can access your information.

items.question: Can I consult a doctor online?
items.answer: Yes, Doctagné offers teleconsultation with qualified doctors. You can choose between a remote consultation or an in-office visit based on your needs.

items.question: How can I access my test results?
items.answer: Once your tests are done in one of our partner labs, the results are automatically available in your personal space securely.

contact.title: Need help? We’re here for you!

testimonials.description: Discover the stories of people who transformed their access to healthcare.

items.name: Mariama Touré
items.text: I never imagined a medical platform could be so simple and effective. As a mother, being able to manage my children's appointments, view their lab results, and even do teleconsultations from home has truly changed my daily life.

items.name: Amadou Diallo
items.text: With my busy schedule, Doctagné has helped me stop neglecting my health. Booking appointments is quick, I can consult online, and my test results are available instantly. Exactly what I needed!

items.name: Fatou Ndiaye
items.text: Finding a pharmacy open at 2 AM for my sick child used to be a nightmare. Now with Doctagné, I can instantly find pharmacies open nearby. Real peace of mind for parents!

items.name: Ibrahima Sow
items.text: At my age, frequent hospital trips are exhausting. Teleconsultation allows me to follow my treatment regularly without leaving home. The doctors are very professional and attentive. Highly recommended!

our-approach.mainTitle: Our mission & vision for a better healthcare system
our-approach.description: At Doctagné, we place the patient at the heart of everything we do. We offer human, accessible, and personalized care through a modern and secure platform. Our approach is based on trust, simplicity, and high-quality medical follow-up to make healthcare closer to you.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To make healthcare accessible, simple, and connected for everyone. Through technology, Doctagné makes it easier to book appointments, access teleconsultations, and follow up on medical care in a secure and human environment.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To build a world where everyone can easily access quality healthcare wherever they are. Doctagné aims to become the bridge between patients and healthcare professionals by combining technology, proximity, and trust.

values.title: Our Values
values.text: At Doctagné, we believe in accessible, ethical, and human-centered healthcare. We use technology to promote well-being and bring healthcare professionals and patients closer together.

our-care.description: Doctagné puts technology at the service of people. Through our platform, patients benefit from personalized, secure, and continuous support — from booking an appointment to receiving results.

results.description: With Doctagné, access a simple, fast, and secure medical follow-up. Our platform connects patients and healthcare professionals to provide efficient, human, and accessible care for everyone.

item1.title: Expert medical team
item1.text: Our network brings together rigorously selected doctors, pharmacists, and partner laboratories. You benefit from reliable and professional support at every stage of your healthcare journey.

item2.title: Advanced technology
item2.text: Doctagné leverages the power of digital tools for your well-being. With a modern and secure platform, you can book appointments, consult, and track your results wherever you are.

item3.title: Patient-centered approach
item3.text: Because every person is unique, we place your needs and comfort at the heart of our mission.
